channel.title: Windows on juri.strumpflohner
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on juri.strumpflohner

item.title: Backup your Win8 computer to your Synology NAS
item.description: I love my Macbook Pro which I’ve been using now for about 6 years. At work I’m a PC user and lately I acquired a Surface Pro 3 as well.

item.title: Win7: Windows Explorer Doesn't Refresh Elements
item.description: This was a really weird problem. Overnight Windows Explorer on my Windows 7 Enterprise installation stopped refreshing items. For instance, I created a new file and/or renamed an existing one and nothing happened until I manually pressed F5 to refresh.

item.title: HowTo: Teach Visual Studio to Remember Your TFS Password
item.description: I often now ran into the problem of continuously getting queried for the TFS credentials when connecting to the company's TFS server from my personal notebook.

item.title: HowTo: Run IIS 7 on Vista 64bit OS in 32bit mode
item.description: A couple of days ago, I ran into a nice problem. I had to configure the setup of a new project using an old ASP based application as the entry point from which then the new ASP.

item.title: Intel ProSet Wireless tool causing a lot of trouble
item.description: Years ago I installed the Intel ProSet Wireless tool for managing my wireless network connections on my HP Compaq. Initially it worked quite well, but then updating it several times introduced a couple of bugs such as delaying the windows startup time because a related service waited till a certain timeout for proceeding etc.

item.title: HowTo: execute a file download from Windows command line
item.description: Under Linux it is often very comfortable to download files quickly from within the shell by typing wget [some URL], especially if you do that from within a script.

item.title: Extended User Management under XP
item.description: This will become just a very short post since I'm too tired to write a lot today. I just set up my little "server" the term is maybe not really appropriate, anyway.

item.title: What now: Program Files or Programme??
item.description: A friend of mine has recently acquired a new Dell notebook with a German copy of Windows Vista. On the German Windows version there exists a folder "

item.title: Vista and stability??
item.description: I don't have yet installed the new - so much promoted - operating system of Microsoft: Windows Vista, codename: Longhorn. However I recently had the possibility to see it running on a Dell notebook which a friend of mine acquired.

item.title: When Windows tray-icons disappear misteriously
item.description: Recently when starting my computer, I noticed that some icons were missing in the notification area (how the tray-icon area is called on XP). Mainly AntiVir, Sygate Personal Firewall and the Intel PROSet Wireless tool were missing.
